dct_description_sm: Coordinates are approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
6 bar scales on map, given in "Leguas Esps.," "Leguas Francs.," Grandes milles arabes," "Leguas inglesas," "Millas alemanas," and "Millas geogrs."
Shows topography (including deserts), drainage, islands surrounding continent, political boundaries.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Caroline Batchelor Map Collection courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
